references.reason: This paper introduces the fundamental concept of diffusion models which are core to the techniques discussed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is a crucial component used for both ID encoding and image-text alignment in the target paper's method.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-quality text-to-image diffusion model (SDXL) that serves as the foundation for the model in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Arcface: Additive angular margin loss for deep face recognition
references.reason: Arcface, introduced here, is a crucial component used for calculating the ID loss, ensuring high fidelity in the generated images.

references.paper_title: Directly fine-tuning diffusion models on differentiable rewards
references.reason: This paper discusses a method for directly fine-tuning diffusion models which is relevant to the tuning-free approach discussed in the target paper.
